results.description: Mauro Icardi scores late winner helping Paris St-Germain return to winning ways in Ligue 1 with victory away to Brest.

results.description: PSG sporting director Leonardo criticises comments by Real Madrid boss Zinedine Zidane about the club's striker Kylian Mbappe.

results.description: Metz left-back Manuel Cabit is seriously injured in a car crash, while team-mate Kevin N'Doram escapes uninjured.

results.title: Manuel Cabit of Metz seriously injured in car crash, Kevin N'Doram escapes injury

results.description: Fifa tells Cardiff City they face a ban on signing players for three transfer windows in the dispute over the transfer of striker Emiliano Sala.

results.description: Paris St-Germain slump to a third Ligue 1 defeat of the season as bottom side Dijon come from behind to stun the French champions.

results.title: Dijon 2-1 Paris Saint Germain: French champions slump to shock defeat against bottom side

results.description: Barcelona's players offered to accept delays to their pay if it would help the club re-sign forward Neymar in the summer, says Gerard Pique.

results.title: Neymar: Barcelona players 'were willing to delay pay' to help re-sign Brazil star

results.description: Italy midfielder Marco Verratti signs a three-year contract extension that will keep him at Paris St-Germain until 2024.

results.description: Paris St-Germain take advantage of Nantes' defeat against Monaco on Friday by thrashing Marseille to move eight points clear at the top of Ligue 1.

results.description: Cardiff City have been told to pay the first instalment of £5.3m to Nantes for striker Emiliano Sala, who died in a plane crash.
